Message.Title: Amazon to offer free smart phone....really
Message.Msg: I guess that will add another $100 to the stock price.... BEZOs is genious...continually coming up with more ways to sacrifice short term profits...lol. I guess if the street keeps rewarding this guy via AMZN stock price increases, he will keep running the same game over and over. I guess one day the street will grow tired of this promise of "profit in the future" and stop rewarding this company and BEZOs for growing revenues with no profits.

Topic.Title: Amazon to offer free smart phone....really

Message.Msg: This is worse than revenue with no profits. It is much more akin to market share with no revenue.

Message.Title: AMZN to 315
Message.Msg: Last time AMZN did this it went STRAIGHT from 275 to 305. Check the chart. Lower high to lower low to lower low and then it rallies for a couple days, rest for a day and then rallied from 275 to 305. So what? I didn't think that would happen then and if it can happen once it can happen twice. Ain't no limit on stupid.

Topic.Title: Amazon to offer free smart phone....really

Message.Msg: LMFAO who ever pumped Amazon up this high. Now they're stuck with holding a non-profit organization, it's like giving money away to charity only you are feeling good but not your bank account. He [Bezos] will slowly reduce his stake in this scam a million shares here and there to "real" assets and we will eventually have 100 billion worth of bag holders. That will be the day.
